<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58" lineLink="#a9c2ea53e311b4b49ebec4c806c9f8d6b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a9c2ea53e311b4b49ebec4c806c9f8d6b">EndianWriter</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer">support::endian::Writer</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the instruction has a type argument for operand 1, and defines an ID</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// output register in operand 0 If so, we need to swap operands 0 and 1 so the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// type comes first in the output, despide coming second in the MCInst.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63" lineLink="#a69f8a6a325901e0745c40c9f13c1a77d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a69f8a6a325901e0745c40c9f13c1a77d">hasType</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrinfo">MCInstrInfo</a> &amp;MII) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc">MCInstrDesc</a> &amp;MCDesc = MII.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrinfo/#a176ca2c9108a997dcfd8aadf4c0f0fa0">get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we define an output, and have at least one other argument.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a3496944fcc473dfe584e6615503a7a76">getNumDefs</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp; MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0ca904e64ee29c8812ed34e632d3c947">getNumOperands</a>() &gt;= 2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we define an ID, and take a type as operand 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0f4e09a761d45bf0914f26d4c149ddeb">operands</a>()&#91;0&#93;.RegClass &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">           MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0f4e09a761d45bf0914f26d4c149ddeb">operands</a>()&#91;1&#93;.RegClass &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">           MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0f4e09a761d45bf0914f26d4c149ddeb">operands</a>()&#91;0&#93;.RegClass != SPIRV::TYPERegClassID &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">           MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0f4e09a761d45bf0914f26d4c149ddeb">operands</a>()&#91;1&#93;.RegClass == SPIRV::TYPERegClassID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76" lineLink="#a4d70c868bafbd7d427233717f0738f87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a4d70c868bafbd7d427233717f0738f87">emitOperand</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;CB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.isReg()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit the id index starting at 1 (0 is an invalid index).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#add1f2d1d972957d22186f4ec92f985f6">support::endian::write&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">        CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#a4df23dddc646b6a4b36ff483063a4ff8">Register::virtReg2Index</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getReg()) + 1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">llvm::endianness::little</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.isImm()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected operand type in VReg&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit the type in operand 1 before the ID in operand 0 it defines, and all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// remaining operands in the order they come naturally.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Encode the first 32 SPIR-V bytes with the number of args and the opcode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t OpCode = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-spirvmccodeemitter-cpp-/spirvmccodeemitter/#aec14628a745202196b06e6affe187059">getBinaryCodeForInstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, Fixups, STI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t NumWords = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands() + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t FirstWord = (NumWords &lt;&lt; 16) | OpCode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
